subject: Football
lead_paragraph: LaDainian Tomlinson had 140 total yards, including 73 on three receptions, and Michael Turner added 147 yards rushing as the Chargers routed the Broncos, 41-3.
snippet: LaDainian Tomlinson had 140 total yards, including 73 on three receptions, and Michael Turner added 147 yards rushing as the Chargers routed the Broncos, 41-3.
